#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int i,j,k,l,p,x;
	cin>>x;
	for(i=0;i<x;i++)
	{
		string s1,s2;
		int arr1[26]={0},arr2[26]={0};
		cin>>s1;
		cin>>s2;
		for(j=0;j<s1.length();j++)
		{
			arr1[s1[j]-97]++;
		}
		for(j=0;j<s2.length();j++)
		{
			arr2[s2[j]-97]++;
		}
		for(j=0;j<26;j++)
		{
			if(arr1[j]!=arr2[j])
			break;
		}
		if(j!=26)
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	}
}
